name: Invader Breakers
description:
• Score points by destroying blocks
  • Loss points by letting invaders escape or losing balls
  • Move paddles together with W and S or Up and Down Arrows
  • Move cannon with A and D or Left and Right Arrows
  • Game changes to "Space Invaders" mode after a number of invaders are destroyed and back to "Breakout" mode after a short time
  • Press space to launch balls or fire cannon
  • Destroy all the invaders before you run out of balls to win!

Game made with Unity and pixel art made with Aseprite

Music, some sound effects and font from Kenny. Other sound effects from Ray Wenderlich
